purpose: To provide a curated list of papers and resources for researchers and practitioners in the field of Embodied AI
principle: Aggregates and organizes significant research papers and resources related to Embodied AI
reusability: Open-source list that can be used as a reference by researchers, students, and industry professionals
limitations: Limited to the scope of existing research and resources in Embodied AI; does not include real-time updates or interactive features
name: Awesome-Embodied-AI
description: A curated list of awesome papers on Embodied AI and related research/industry-driven resources.
highlight: Comprehensive curation of resources and papers focused on Embodied AI
